description: Listed Building Consent in connection with infill lightwell to form kitchen extension. Replacement of bedroom doors with new wooden doors. Replacement of kitchen window with wooden door to provide access from lower ground flat to patio and new metal grill over new glazed canopy to provide garden access from upper ground flat. Internal alterations.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: No repointing of brickwork is authorised by this consent without prior approval of details. Proposals shall be submitted to and approved by the Council as local planning authority before the work is begun, and the work shall be carried out in accordance with such approved proposals.

REASON: In order to safeguard the special architectural or historic interest of the building included in the Statutory List and to comply with the requirements of PPS 5 (Planning for the Historic Environment).
